resources.string: Pay the fees of the selected course to our Bkash account and enter the transaction number below:

Our institution was born out of passion .A passion for making difference Creating a movement of OnnoRokom Manush(different humans) and bringing about a change.When our institution was founded in the later part of 2000, its founders had no idea that it would take on a life of its own.We provide our best for the good of the students.We have a great number of qualified and experienced teachers and instructors.we provide all kinds of facilities to our students.
